text: B. alba may refer to: * Baptisia alba, the white wild indigo or white false indigo, a herbaceous plant species native from central and eastern North America * Basella alba, the Malabar spinach, a perennial vine species found in the tropics * Bidens alba, an Asteraceae plant species. * Bryonia alba, the white bryony, a vigorous Eurasian vine species introduced into Western North America ==See also== * Alba (disambiguation)
title: B. alba
